website_summaries.verdict: Classic looking boot with a square toe and a comfortable fit right out of the box.
pros: Great support with a classic look
Will stand the test of time
Soft leather outer and lining for comfort
Ideal for first-time boot owners and great for dancing
cons: Not the best choice for barn work

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! So well made and sooo cute! I did order a half size up and I'm glad I did. I normally wear a 7 I got a 7.5 and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrin I Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Boots, Perfect fit... Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a pair of boots that were stylish and would go with an outfit I plan to wear to a wedding in a few weeks. I stumbled across these. I wasn't sure what my boot size was, as these are my first pair of cowboy boots. Some people have told me to go up a size. I decided to go on my gut feeling and just get my regular shoe size. When they came they fit perfectly!! These boots are gorgeous! I love them!!! They don't have much grip on the sole as it is leather! However over all I'd give these a 5 star!!! I would definitely purchase another pair of Justin Boots!!
customer_reviews.author: Mk279

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. The quality is excellent. I did try to get a size 8 wide, but evidently that size sold out. Amazon sent me information that said the manufacturer could not fulfill my purchase due to "technical difficulty". That only means the boot I purchase sold out. No worries. The manufacturer has a 'find your size" option and when I put in my details it suggested a boot size. Fortunately that size WAS in stock. I am very happy with these boots. I wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Flo Fascia

customer_reviews.title: Gorge.
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They are so gorgeous! And comfortable! This is actually my second pair of these, because I lost the first in a gnarly car wreck where the contents of my car were strewn all over the freeway :'(. Anyways I missed the first pair so I bought the same ones again, but in a different color. I honestly don't get much use out of these boots because they are so ostentatious and I'm not at ALL in an outdoorsy-rancher line of work. But I bet if you wanted to wear them a ton they would serve you well!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Fujii

customer_reviews.title: Love Justin boots. These have a wood base, I like rubber better
customer_reviews.text: I am kinda bummed that it scratches easily, and has a wood bottom that is already scratched up. I bought another Justin set that looked similar but with rubber instead of wood, and they lasted over 2 years. I hike in them, go through creeks, garden, push gravel with them, and yet when I cleaned them up, I could wear them to church. I won’t ever try to push around gravel in any leather boots. It tore one.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, just as picture shows
customer_reviews.text: The boots are exactly what I needed and at a great price, only down fall was the shipping. Came quick and in the original box but I would preferred they stuff the boot all the way to the top, rather than just the toes. The top edge of one of the boots arrived a bit crimped over from packing, I’m sure it’ll go back to normal as I break them in but stuffing the boot with paper all the way up could’ve prevented it. Otherwise very happy!
customer_reviews.author: MK in Rhinebeck

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my Justin boots!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my Justins! They fit perfectly although I went a step UP in size instead of the recommended lower size than my actual shoe size. I wear an 8 in regular shoes so I ordered a nine and they’re absolutely perfect and have the recommended “pop” when putting them on. I recommend these highly and the price is awesome! 👢
customer_reviews.author: Just me!

customer_reviews.title: Superb comfort and great look
customer_reviews.text: These boots are classic and very comfortable. My first time wearing them I walked three miles or so to attend an All Souls processional in downtown. I was a little concerned that my boots would require some breaking in but that was not the case. As recommended, I ordered a half size smaller than normal to accomodate thick socks. I could have gone down another half size and been fine. As they are slightly large it is a breeze pulling them off. The construction is height quality and the design the quintessential,cowboy boot. Go with one of the less traditional colors to make more of a fashion statement.
customer_reviews.author: Cholla gal

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are fabulous. They are super comfortable. I bought them and didn’t have time to break them in before a trip. Wore them for several hours walking and had no pain or rubbing. The quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First pair EVER and I LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: These were my first pair ever to purchase and I LOVE THEM. They are comfortable and fit very well. I have issues with my feet always hurting and tying to find shoes/sandals/boots is hard especially online, but I'm so glad I found these. I received numerous compliments on them too. They are very pretty and I love how versatile they can be and what all you could wear with them.
customer_reviews.author: StashiaP

customer_reviews.title: cute boots!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots in a 7 and a 7.5 based on reviews. I always wear a 7.5 and have wide feet. The 7s were too small. The 7.5b fits good. It seems that if you have narrow feet, you need a half size smaller because if not, your foot will slide too far into boot. If you have more wide than narrow feet, I'd go with your regular size. A friend of mine had to go a half size smaller but she has long narrow feet. The leather seems very durable and the design is subtle, which is what I wanted. I will definitely be wearing these all winter with shorts, dresses, jeans, leggings and anything else possible!!
customer_reviews.author: kart

customer_reviews.title: My new Favorite Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I am exceedingly pleased with my recent purchase of these Justin boots. The quality and fit are both exceptional. As many reviewers have already noted, the shaft is roomy enough to accommodate larger calves comfortably, something that has been an issue for me when purchasing boots in the past. Some reviewers recommended ordering a half size down, but I elected to order my exact size, as my feet are neither wide nor narrow, but perfectly average. They feel as though there were tailored to my foot! I couldn't be happier with my purchase. These boots are definitely worth the price in terms of both quality and comfort. I hope this review is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Justin Boots Women's Classic Western Boot,Tan Damiana,6 B US
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots. Bought a pair of these for my girlfriend for Christmas. She wears a size 6 in all of her shoes. She tried these on and her heel would move a little bit when she walked. We decided to order a 5.5 to see if they fit better. She could barely get the 5.5 on. We ended up buying a pair of boot socks (a little thicker than her normal socks) and the 6 fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dunthy

customer_reviews.title: Love the Justin Tan Damiana
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I read the reviews regarding the sizing and decided to go with my gut instinct. I bought my normal size 8B and they fit perfect. Not too big or too small, they're just right. I don't have wide nor narrow feet, just average feet. Fits well around my small to average calves, not too loose. It's probably about 15" in circumference (size 8B) and 13" tall. These boots are very comfy and color is great just like the picture. Love how the boots have a distressed look and nice leather smell. I bought the Justin Tan Damiana.
customer_reviews.author: Joyjoy

customer_reviews.title: Love the boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They look good and feel good. But as a few others noted, they're not for straight leg jeans. Even my boot leg jeans aren't wide enough to accommodate the boot without any "show through." It's a big deal for me because I don't really like it when you can see my boots through my jeans (and you can't exactly tuck boot leg jeans into the boot without it looking absoutely ridiculous), but it's easy to overlook once you get them on and see how pretty they are! I gave them 5 stars because it's not the boot's fault that I haven't yet found the perfect jeans to go with my perfect boots!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot For Wide Feet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely LOVES her new boots. When I found these on sale I had to get her a pair as she has been a "country girl" all her life. And what country gal doesn't love a pair of cozy boots? Oh and by the way, my daughter has a very wide foot. I made sure to find a pair that would be comfortable for her and these work great she says.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Tight at first but loosening up nicely
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a size 10 boot, but I took the others reviewer's advice and purchased at 9 1/2. They were REALLY tight around my toes at first but after a few days of wear they are loosening up and feel good. My first pair of western boots and so far I love them! They look great dressed up or down. I also have small calves and I think that these boots arent too big around the calves and look nice. If you're on the fence go for it, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Breezey

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, especially for wide calves.
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase. Good looking boot, well made and comfortable. My calves are on the big side, so boots can be a challenge. These boots have a large calf width so I had no issues with them fitting. One downfall is because of the wide shaft width wearing the boots under jeans is impossible, the boots show through and it just looks weird. So these boots can really only be worn with jeans tucked in, leggings, or skirts/ dressers, which I'm fine with.
customer_reviews.author: LibertyBell

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive boot
customer_reviews.text: True to size for a non-wide 6.5. A bit tight to put on but expect that with this type of boot. Absolutely gorgeous black finish with attractive stitching. Rather pointed; not for riding or kicking around but for nicer events. Note the heel takes some experience to walk comfortably
customer_reviews.author: E. Mar

customer_reviews.title: The color shown has a green hue to it. ...
customer_reviews.text: The color shown has a green hue to it. That is the reason I purchased the boots. The boots are actually a Tannish brown not tannish green as shown. The description said Tan so expected the boots to definitely be a lighter shade than they actually are. Again I purchased them because the hue of green is what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Love color, style, fit.....
customer_reviews.text: I Love these boots. They are a little wider at the top than I expected but it doesn't change a thing. I've worn Cowboy Boots my whole life and I find these quite comfortable.They are very soft leather and feel broken in already. I did add a little arch support, but I do that for most of my shoes and boots, as I have a very high arch.
customer_reviews.author: Rainne97

customer_reviews.title: Best Boot Buy Ever
customer_reviews.text: Now this is what I'm talking about. These boots are quality craftsmanship and the materials used are excellent. I love my boots and being a size 11 that's not something I can often say. They are comfortable. They are snug at the beginning and I needed a boot stripper to get them off, but in the end, after you wear them for a while, they just mold to your figure and now they fit perfect. Had they been any different they would be too loose by now. So hang in there and wear em out a few times, you'll see what I mean. And they are lookers!
customer_reviews.author: pegster

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of boots I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: They are a little larger sized than normal...but it works out well for me because I like to wear a thicker sock with my boots and they fit perfectly with the thicker sock. I can wear these boots all day and night and they have yet to cause any foot discomfort (I have other boots you can't wear for too long, or walk around in without hurting the foot!) They are gorgeous boots and I have received many compliments when I wear them! I bought the Tan Damiana color.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: sizing help
customer_reviews.text: i got a size 8.5 C and I'm normally an 9 in any shoe i get. sometimes i need wide in shoes normally known to run narrow bc i have small bunions. this boot will stretch! it is hard to get on at first, but thats boots for you. I even got the 9M to be sure that the 8.5C were what i needed, and my foot slipped into the 9 way too easily. knowing that leather will stretch, this is not a good sign. very happy with the 8.5C with length and enough width for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: sophie

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots very much!
customer_reviews.text: These are my first beautiful cowgirl boots! I love how the arrived packaged very nicely! The smell of the leather tells me these boots are going to last me a long time! They are very girly and sexy! Highly recommend and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Justluvhim

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pair of boots. They fit perfectly. Had some fitting instructions at a boot shop, but could not find anything to fit properly. These fit as instructed. I ordered my regular shoe size and the C/D because I have wide feet. As soon as they arrived, I put them on, rather slipped them on, with no problem. Justin Boots are for me. Ready to order a brown pair. Thankyou.
customer_reviews.author: GAILE T.

customer_reviews.title: Got these for my wife
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected on my wife (7.5 B fit like a glove with a thin sock). They have a good look to them and provide a flattering shape on the leg. Solid leather construction, leather sole, made in mexico (they know how to make great boots there too). If you're in the market for some affordable stylish and durable boots that do not skimp on comfort, well these boots may just be what your foot has been waiting for.
customer_reviews.author: RNorthcote

customer_reviews.title: Great after breaking them in
customer_reviews.text: Ran a little narrow. Hard to get on and off the first time. Not a lot of traction in the sole of the shoe - slipped all over carpeting the first time I wore them to break them in. Got better after more wear. I liked the narrow fitted calf when they were brand new, but of course they stretched with time. A great buy and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Great true red cowgirl boots
customer_reviews.text: I have an incredibly high arch so don't know if these boots have good arch support for regular feet. Regardlessly, they are comfortable. The color is incredible! I have only worn them on one occasion for a few hours and they were comfortable with no blisters or breaking in period. I have always wanted red cowgirl boots and these did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 7 which is what I typically wear and they fit great. There is a little wiggle room which allows comfort for my toes or to wear thicker socks. The upper part of the boot is a little stiff, but they are easy to get on and have been very comfortable wearing all day. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Charles

customer_reviews.title: Holy beautiful boots, Batman!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting real cowboy boots for a while now and finally decided to go for it. Honestly, I though they were going to be far more expensive. It didn't take long for me to choose these boots. They were perfect in every way I wanted, had great reviews, and weren't $300! Sold! They arrived smelling like leather and have been a great fit from day one. I still have to have my husband tug off the boots, but other than that, they are very comfortable and all around wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes that I own.
customer_reviews.text: I have very small and narrow feet and these boot fit like a glove. BY far the most comfortable boots I have ever had. This is the only brand I will ever buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chariety

customer_reviews.title: Justin Boots Women's Classic Western Boot,Tan Damiana,8 C US
customer_reviews.text: so happy to order a wide width 8C - truly love the color Tan Damiana - shipping was fast and inexpensive compared to other boot and shoe suppliers thru amazon I've ordered from recently - these are comfortable, beautiful and make me miss my rocky mountain jeans from days gone by :) very very happy ... just a little FYI in shoes I wear a 39 euro or 8.5 to a 9 depending on width and shape of toe.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Maree

customer_reviews.title: Love my boots!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried at first that these boots might not fit my "thicker than average calves," but the boots fit and I am so pleased. They are comfortable and I wear them all the time. I get a lot of compliments. Thank you Justin boots, you have done it again!
customer_reviews.author: Lezieh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty boots that look just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Pretty boots that look just like the picture. I've only worn them a couple times so far, but my right boot rubs a bit on my right ankle, whereas the left one does not. This issue should become moot as I wear them more since they are leather and should soften over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, great price.
customer_reviews.text: The boots are extremely comfortable. They have memory form which helps. They are a little snug on my ankles getting off. They are also a good color. Not as red as I thought, which is good. Glad I ordered them
customer_reviews.author: Jane Damon

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! As others have said, order a half size smaller. Also, a tip for getting new boots on while breaking them in is to use plastic grocery bags over your socks...I know, I know, sounds weird but it works. Your feet will slide right in and you can't feel the bags at all. I had to do this when I was competing in country western dancing! New dance boots are incredibly tight at first! Anyways, I high recommend these boots! Very cute, great price, and all around great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Driver

customer_reviews.title: great boots
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and fit just right. Didn't take long to break in either. I would recommend going to a boot store and getting fitted before buying any cowboy boots since the width is important. All Justin boots pretty much fit the same from my experience. Shipping was very fast. I would recommend these to anyone who wants a cute affordable quality boot.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa D

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous. Constant compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I love my red boots. They get compliments all the time. When I unwrapped them, they had that amazing leather smell. They clean up pretty well. Someone called them the "footloose" boots. Caution- for those not knowing about boots, they are slippery on mulch and certain surfaces. Also, they are not very warm. Good for fall but not winter. (yes they are leather, but that won't keep your toes warm in the cold).
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Semon

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! Perfect color, stitching, and all around look. I have narrow feet, I'm normally a 6 but I ordered the 51/2, fit is perfect. If you are used to a long shaft with no zip then breaking in putting them on and taking them off will be no problem. Probably not for women with thicker calves or ankles. It was a perfect purchase for my foot .....and I love the style. Couldn't be happier. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S                           East Coast

customer_reviews.title: Texas Girls love boots...
customer_reviews.text: Well I had to get my hands on a pair, but mainly for fashion reasons. With that being written, I love my shoes and they hurt at times. Square toes are the way to go if you're wanting a more realistic shoe, but if you're a fake cowgirl like me... get them!! Also I have flat and wide feet soooo... smh
customer_reviews.author: LilDallas

customer_reviews.title: The shoes is beautiful. However I had to return it because the ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes is beautiful. However I had to return it because the left shoe had almost like a bent,mushed by the ankle. Otherwise it's great quality. The color is beautiful. Well made. Worth the money for sure. True to size. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Delma Finkelstein

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Justin Boots! (Order 1/2 size down!)
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the majority of the reviews here - GORGEOUS BOOTS! But just make sure to order a 1/2 size (or even a full size) down! I normally wear a size 8.5 in all close-toed and running shoes and I ordered a size 8 after reading the reviews and I am SO glad that I did! I still can wear pretty thick socks with the boots, but I prefer wearing thick socks with boots because my feet are always cold. So if you have narrow feet and prefer wearing thinner socks with boots, you could probably go an entire full size down. LOVE these boots!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M. Hutton

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful boots. I am normally a 10.5 wide or an 11 medium Since they didn't have a 10.5 wide, I bought the 11 wide. They are beautiful boots, but they could be a size smaller. They are still very comfy though and absolutely stunning. I have gotten many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for HUGE calves
customer_reviews.text: I returned these. I have large calves - 15 3/4" and these were SO big on them. They were almost floppy looking. Not sure if I got a defective item or not.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: They honestly are so adorable! I ordered the wide which are definitely wide ...
customer_reviews.text: They honestly are so adorable! I ordered the wide which are definitely wide on me, but I couldn't beat the $55 buck price!! I'll just wear some thicker socks :) They are the real deal. Everything shown in the pics is what you get. Real leather smell the instant I opened the box. Thank you! Cant wait to wear them to Garth Brooks!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Salazar

customer_reviews.title: wonderful boots!
customer_reviews.text: A very comfortable and stylish boot ( for me anyway )! I have several different brands of boots and prefer the Justin`s! When i add more western boots to my collection, they will be Justin`s!
customer_reviews.author: "geecee"

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 7, but based on the prior reviews, I purchased a size 6.5. They fit perfectly on me. I have very wide calves and normally cannot find western boots that fit. However, these boots seem to have been sent from Heaven to me. I really love them. They are stylish and I've received many compliments. I've also worn these boot many times for the entire day... they are that comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: ... are my first cowgirl boots and they are so beautiful. Just got them a couple days ago and ...
customer_reviews.text: This are my first cowgirl boots and they are so beautiful. Just got them a couple days ago and i have been using it in the house although it does not seem to need to be broken in,They feel very confortable. I might get sometime later get another pair in a different color and shaft height. These are 13" high I might get next time a 11" with lower heel for a more casual look
customer_reviews.author: Maria de Fatima Lynch

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: I love them. The only complaint would be I kinda disappointed that the first day I wore them, breaking them in I noticed in the ankle of one boot the leather had already wrinkled and tore. Hopefully I just need to leather condition or boot cleaner will help hide it. I expected wear & tear but not the leather already tearing or coming apart...
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love, love them!
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit perfectly! I own many pairs of different brands and this fit just the same. I love the quality and they're very comfortable. I was very pleased with the quality and the look and feel of the boot. My first pair of Justin boots and definitely not the last!
customer_reviews.author: L. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed as I had hight hopes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several pairs of boots at once from Amazon for a wedding and found these to be the most uncomfortable. Very disappointed as I had hight hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cowen

customer_reviews.title: Color is very dark....
customer_reviews.text: I love Justin boots but was not thrilled with this purchase and have since returned. These are very well made but the color was much darker than I expected and I felt the sizing ran a little large. Otherwise, prompt delivery and great packaging but just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Powers

customer_reviews.title: I am returning this product. I went out the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this product. I went out the night that I received the replacement boots and the left foot again is too large. It is something wrong with this style. I also noticed that the ribbing on the side is very dry and is cracking. Shouldn't do that out with one night of dancing. I am returning the boot as the quality is not what I expected for the price I paid. I also cannot tolerate the smell of this boot. I will returning there and request a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D. Thacker

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love with these new boots
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with these new boots! The color is pretty and they match everything I wear. They need a little breaking in but are comfortable. They aren’t tight across my foot as I have had problems in the past with other brands of boots. The material is great with no imperfections!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna P

customer_reviews.title: I love this boot.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of cowboy (girl) boots, and I must say that I am pleased. They are snug fitting, They ran pretty true to fit for me, I wear a 9.5m most times and these did fir for me as I ordered. I haven't wore them out yet, however around the house they feel great!
customer_reviews.author: I AM Love

customer_reviews.title: Get these boots NOW!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous boot. Great quality. Good fit. Super comfortable. They make that perfect boot "pop" when I slip them on. The toe is narrow, but my toes do not feel squished at all. I plan to wear them for a very long time. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Perez

customer_reviews.title: These boots are great!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are exactly what I was looking for, I wanted a really pretty, good quality leather, western boot that didn't cost too much, as I wear western style boots most of the time and want to be able to get different pairs. (Yes, I wear western boots w/skirts, dresses and jeans! :)!) So, I will probably buy another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: The OLearys

customer_reviews.title: Proper Cowgirl Boots
customer_reviews.text: They fit well, are made extremely well, and She (still!) loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Timelessly beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these. They're so beautifully classic. They ran just a tad big for me, so I had to downsize a half size, but they're super comfy and gorgeous. I get a ton of compliments every time I wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Molly R.

customer_reviews.title: Her friend has several pairs of the Justin Boots and highly recommended them when my girlfriend requested a pair of boots ...
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves these boots! Her friend has several pairs of the Justin Boots and highly recommended them when my girlfriend requested a pair of boots for her birthday. We treated them with waterproofing, which came in handy the first time she wore them to a Dierks Bentley concert in the pouring rain. She regularly says they are one of the most comfortable pairs of shoes she owns.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I received these boots as a gift from my mom and I couldn't be more pleased. They fit true to size and I have received so many compliments on them! The color is a beautiful, rich color and the leather is of great quality. Mom hit a home run with these!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: ... need the black ones next - but these are perfect. Stiff (to be expected ) - I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Thinking I need the black ones next - but these are perfect. Stiff (to be expected ) - I can get them on fine but need help pulling them off at the end of the day. Once on, they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: Eleganly bold boot
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for: a cowboy boot with a pop of color without being too ornate. The overall color is slightly daker than appears in the photo, which I actually like a lot. Good quality leather. Love my new boots!
customer_reviews.author: MamaBee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality boots
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews were accurate! Thank you everyone! I am a size 9 (most of the time). I ordered an 8 1/2. Perfect. The tops are a little big. My calves are not wide. It does not look bad. The pointed toes are quite pointy. I am very happy with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: OMG most amazing boot EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with the boot the moment I slipped it on! Comfortable even for my wide feet. Love the color, love the style, love the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE these boots! Gorgeous, comfortable, and my friends are already trying to borrow them, which is a clear indication that these boots are keepers.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Love

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots! Well made and stunning
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots! Well made and stunning. I returned my boots because the were too large. I wear an 8 1/2 to a 9 and ordered a 8 1/2 but they didn't fit. I returned these with no problems and received a fast return on my money. The seller was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Amazeboots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are absolutely gorgeous! The distressed leather gives it a vintage look and they are super comfortable. I've received so many compliments on them! I am definitely gearing up for another pair, a must have!
customer_reviews.author: L. M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots!!!! They were a little big, but with thick socks its not bad! I wore them all night the first time I wore them and my feet did not hurt at all!!! They are beautiful boots and I am very happy with them! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tamra

customer_reviews.title: So Large
customer_reviews.text: I did think these were nice looking boots, however even trying these with thick socks they were too big. I do have a small foot,size 5-5 1/2,don't know how they they size,but these were more 6-61/2. So I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: capital one

customer_reviews.title: They are very pretty so I'll find a way to be comfortable in ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a half size larger but they are still tight. They are very pretty so I'll find a way to be comfortable in them.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these just wish they were alittle smaller I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these just wish they were alittle smaller I did get a size smaller just I should gave went a size and 1/2 smaller but next time I'll know! Other then that I all way get people coming up to me saying they love them and where did I get them!! :) really happy
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: best ever boots
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in my regular size. Beautiful comfortable boot and can be worn with almost anything. Highly recommend this, getting other colors now. You will love this boot. Thank you Justin and Amazon. Did I mention it's very wellmade and much prettier than pictured.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: and was quite skeptical about these (price was a little too good to be true) up until they came in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 pairs of boots, and was quite skeptical about these (price was a little too good to be true) up until they came in the mail. I wear them all of the time now! I absolutely love them!!! I would've paid more for them, but glad I didn't have to!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love em!
customer_reviews.text: My boots for a little bit to large, but not too large to where it can't be fixed with thick socks. So far i am loving these boots! They are gorgeous and comfortable. I took them out on the trails with my horse today and the red seems to hold up well against dirty and scuffs. They are not much on traction though, so if you don't where then over dirt or grass, i suggest some rubber passes that would stick to the bottom. A great but overall.
customer_reviews.author: owens

customer_reviews.title: Stylish boots
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite boots! I have quite a collection of cowboy boots and these are by far my favorite. I wear them all the time! They're comfortable and true to size!
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: Having to return and hopefully be able to get a part the right size for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Thomason

customer_reviews.title: Fit very true to size and are great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size I usually wear for boots (7) and it fits perfectly. I have a tad wider feet but wear a size 6.5 in regular shoes and I would not have chosen a different size. The 7's at first seemed a little tight up front but after only 2 days of wear they are now fitting really great! If you have narrower feet maybe go a half size down - but my true size worked for me. These boots are gorgeous! Very worth it.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaBless

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: After I wear them and see if they will stretch normally Justin's won't Other than that I love them.... The price was awesome as well
customer_reviews.author: SNABBS GALORE LLC

customer_reviews.title: justin boots womens western fashion 13 " boot narrow square toe
customer_reviews.text: These boots were i little tight but as they leather I'm sure they will give a little which will make them perfect. Other than that i love these boots they look Fab with jeans skirts or dress go with everything This is my first real pair of cowboy boots i will defiantly buy some again in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: JANE

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Boots were SUPER narrow even though they said they were 3x wide?? Couldn't wear them for the wedding i bought them for but I don't hold the seller fully accountable
customer_reviews.author: Mrs_Heffner

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these boots to a wedding in Vista, California. It was country themed and the dance floor was on concrete. These were super comfortable and easy to dance in. I also love the look of the leather and pattern!
customer_reviews.author: EGSMOM

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Boots
customer_reviews.text: The picture does not do the color and design justice. The stitching is really detailed. The color is a beautiful dark cognac. Really nice pair of boots and the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! I love them so much and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing !! I love them so much and they are great quality and have that awesome leather smell😍 so excited that I finally found some great boots like this. I am a size 8.5 and bought a size 8.5 and the fit is perfect. They do need to be worn in cause they are leather but they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE these boots!
customer_reviews.text: At first I ordered an 8.5 and they were too big, so I exchanged them for an 8 and they could not fit any better!!! I have very narrow flat feet and very skinny ankles and calfs...with the tall shaft they are perfect!!! Priced perfectly too! FIVE STARS!
customer_reviews.author: Stef H

customer_reviews.title: Great price comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful the leather is good quality the boot shaft is wider great for shirts and leggings not for under pants I have only worn a handful of times but seem to be breaking in ok I highly recommend a great quality boot for a decent price
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, I ordered a 7.5 when I typically wear 7.5- 8.... Fits so comfortably! I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: A13williamson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boots! !
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots!!! Great color, great fit, great sized heel. And like the others said, I have a muscular calf and find it hard to find Western boots that will go over them; Not these, they're perfect! You will love them!
customer_reviews.author: Angiego

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots are comfortable and very expensive looking. The details in the boots exceeded my expectations. Every time I wear the boots I get so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots in the Tan. They arrived yesterday. Beautiful boots. I was afraid that they wouldn't fit bcause I have a high arch, wider feet and athletic calves. I also heard horror stories about the painful breaking in period. I ordered my regular size in a wide. They fit perfectly right out of the box. I pulled them on and went shopping. So comfortable. They are a little stiff around the ankle and a little tight across the top of the foot but that will change and it didnt impact how they felt...they will only get more comfortable. I want to wear them every day!
customer_reviews.author: Sascha Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boots, they are a bit on the narrow ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boots, they are a bit on the narrow side but other than that they're great looking and feeling boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These fit true to size and look AMAZING! They are very comfortable - great, great purchase. I'm thinking of even buying them in another color...
customer_reviews.author: Hita

customer_reviews.title: Pretty boot
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boot and pretty colors. I loved the style. I would have kept it except for the fact that it's narrow in the boot shaft and tough to get off. Would recommend you get a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves them
customer_reviews.text: My wife had wanted a good pair of cowboy boots for close to a year now. We had been to several huge Country Western stores and she could not find a pair that fit her right and looked the way she wanted. She has from her no me "large calves" which makes it hard to find boots that fit right. After reading reviews on here I thought these might work perfect and looked the way she wanted. I also knew Justins were a quality brand. I was shocked when she opened them how good of quality they are for the money. She loves them because they are the first boots to actually fit her right.
customer_reviews.author: Greg F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Footloose
customer_reviews.text: These were a great addition to Ariel's costume for Footloose. The color is a perfect deep red. The actress reported them to be comfortable and fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Schwilke

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: Having larger calfs these boots are everything I have ever wanted! love the color and the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful. I usually wear an 8 to an 8 1/2. I ordered an 8 and am pleased. They are a tad big, but I think a 7 1/2 would have been too small. I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Justin Lover
customer_reviews.text: This boot is Sexy and Beautiful! I want another pair!!!! And the price -AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking boot.. not very comfortable.. Hopefully will improve with wear
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

product_meta.title: Justin Boots Women's Classic Western Boot Narrow Square Toe Shoe
product_meta.description:
Product Description The Justin Saddle Torino boots are perfect for the gal who loves the classic country look These boots feature a smooth black leather foot under a matching and fancy stitched 11\" leather shaft. Single stitched welt and leather lining. Easy-on pull straps and updated fashion snip toe profile. Imported. Keep it Classic with this feisty boot from Justin Boots. The sleek leather upper features pitch-perfect western detail while the J-Flex Comfort System and memory foam midsole deliver thoroughly 21st century comfort. A chic pointed toe is the perfect finishing touch.

Keep it Classic with this feisty boot from Justin Boots. The sleek leather upper features pitch-perfect western detail while the J-Flex Comfort System and memory foam midsole deliver thoroughly 21st century comfort. A chic pointed toe is the perfect finishing touch.
feature_bullets: J-Flex Comfort System, Toe: J3 Narrow Square Toe
Pitch-perfect from top to bottom, this classic boot delivers comfort with a feisty kick. Pull-on design with dual pull tabs.
